charges.charge_description: 50:1705.F; 15:764.2(a), (c), (e) PENALTIES, VIOLATES ANY LICENSE OR ORDER(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby sentenced to probation for a term of Two (2) years and six (6) months. The defendant shall pay a fine of $1,753.26 plus the cost of electronic monitoring. Schedule of Payments.
